News Flash

  1. Prescription Drug Take Back Day April 27 10am-2pm

    National Prescription Drug Take-Back Day will be Saturday, April 27, 2019, from 10:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m. at the Celina Fire Department located at 1413 S. Preston Rd. Read on...

  2. Super Hero Movie Night on the Square this Saturday

    Join us for our family-friendly 4th Annual Super Hero Movie Night on the Square, Saturday, April 20th! Activities take place from 6-8pm with a free screening of "Incredibles 2" (PG) at dark. Read on...

  3. Community Forum 1 – Comprehensive Plan Kickoff

    We need your input to make an amazing comprehensive plan, Celina 2040! Read on...

  4. City Hall/Annex Renovations

    The building permits, planning, code enforcement, engineering, and Main Street offices have been relocated to the temporary building behind City Hall. Read on...

  5. Cajun Fest April 13, 2019

    Join us downtown on Saturday, April 13, 2019, for our annual Cajun Festival! Read on...

  6. Voting Information

    Coming soon Read on...

  7. Emergency Road Closure- Legacy Drive (CR 6) - Between Carey road and Honey Creek

    Read on...

  8. City Council approves the Downtown Master Plan at Tuesdays Council Meeting

    A Vision For Smart, Collaborative Growth Expected After Unanimously Approved Downtown Master Plan for the City of Celina. Read on...

  9. Celina 360 Downtown Tour

    Walk the sidewalks of Downtown Celina and take a peek inside businesses and city facilities on this 360 virtual tour. Read on...

  10. ROAD CLOSURE: Fishtrap Rd

    Fishtrap Rd will be closed between FM 1385 and Gee Road in Prosper beginning this week for approximately 12 months, while the Fishtrap bridge is constructed. Read on...

  11. Celina Roadway Projects

    Want to know what's going on around town? Take a look at the City's roadway projects! https://celinatx.maps.arcgis.com/home/index.html Read on...
